summary_points: 1. Packaging Corporation of America (PCA) priced a $500 million offering of 5.200% Senior Notes due 2035 on August 11, 2025.
2. Net proceeds from the note offering are expected to be approximately $495.1 million, which, along with other funds, will finance PCA's acquisition of Greif, Inc.'s containerboard business.

3. Failure to consummate the Greif acquisition by June 30, 2026 (or any extension), or termination of the Greif Purchase Agreement before then, will require PCA to redeem the notes at 101% of their principal amount plus accrued interest.
1. On August 12, 2025, Equinix, Inc. elected Dr. Yanbing Li as an independent director to its Board of Directors, expanding the board to nine members.
2.  Dr. Li's appointment was not made pursuant to any prior agreements with third parties.
3. Dr. Li will receive Equinix's standard compensation for non-employee directors.
